name: Tsukumogami
description: Tsukumogami is the original Japanese version of 99 Spirits.99 Spirits is an RPG/Puzzle game that revolves around the popular Japanese folklore of Tsukumogami, everyday objects coming alive on their 100th birthday.Hanabusa is a young headstrong girl living in the Heian capital within medieval Japan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 1.5GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 7 or newer
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 2GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 7 or newer

reviews.review_text: Dont speak japanese but sounds good and looks good ,Guess it would be good if you spoke japanese. Simple styled game but fun!   80/100 Would try and learn japanese !
